alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 9:57PM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Colfax, Clarkston, Genesee, Oakesdale, Plummer, Clarkston Heights, Pomeroy, Rosalia, Pullman, Uniontown, Moscow, Tekoa, La Crosse, and Potlatch. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
